items.sentence: Tom wanted to spend more time talking with Mary.
Tom and Mary spent hours discussing their plans.
Tom bakes a couple of loaves of bread every day.
Tom had a fairly good job until he got laid off.
I know that Tom wouldn't do something like that.
I think it was Tom who volunteered to help Mary.
I thought that Tom might be in Boston this week.
I'd like to know why Tom isn't going to help us.
I'd still like to know how Tom knew I'd be here.
Tom fired his gun and hit what he was aiming at.
Tom knew that something had gone terribly wrong.
Would you mind if I dropped by tomorrow evening?
I don't have the slightest idea what it's about.
Were you able to do everything you needed to do?
You shouldn't have thrown away the instructions.
When he heard the noise, Tom ran to the kitchen.
Tom knows how to cook, but he can't do it today.
You can't swim to the island. It's too far away.
Within a month of going abroad, Tom became sick.
Our club doesn't currently have a place to meet.
